name: Boom Boom Squaries
synopsis: Furries are cute beings that enjoy rolling around in the sun all day long. But stone-cold Squaries, hating everything that is round and fluffy, attack! Now it is up to you to create chain reactions that will pop the invaders. Prove your skill in 4 different game modes: CLASSIC, CHALLENGE, TIME TRIAL and ENDLESS. Use Squaries' special abilities like gravity, air blast and split to plan your blasts for maximum efficiency!
